languages.text: "Я знаю, что брат мой погиб. Но прежде он успел отправить мне сообщение, рассказав о путешествии, которое предприняла Теодора фон Валанциус. Сквозь пространственные врата — артефакт более древний, чем само Человечество — в миры неизвестности. Благословенный Амарнат был с ней".

"I know that my brother perished. But before he did, he sent me a message that told of a journey embarked upon by Theodora von Valancius. A journey through a dimensional gate — an artefact more ancient than Humanity itself — and toward worlds unknown. The blessed Amarnat was with her."
languages.original_text: "Я знаю, что брат мой погиб. Но прежде он успел отправить мне сообщение, рассказав о путешествии, которое предприняла Теодора фон Валанциус. Сквозь пространственные врата — артефакт более древний, чем само Человечество — в миры неизвестности. Благословенный Амарнат был с ней".

A journey through a dimensional gate — an artefact more ancient than Humanity itself — and toward worlds unknown. The blessed Amarnat was with her."

"I know that my brother perished. But before he did, he sent me a message that told of a journey embarked upon by Theodora von Valancius. A journey through a dimensional gate — an artefact more ancient than Humanity itself — and toward worlds unknown. The blessed Amarnat was with her."

"I know that my brother perished. But before he did, he sent me a message that told of a journey embarked upon by Theodora von Valancius. A journey through a dimensional gate — an artefact more ancient than Humanity itself — and toward worlds unknown. The blessed Amarnat was with her."

languages.text: 「私の兄弟が死んだことは知っている。しかし彼は死ぬ前、私にシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスとの旅について知らせるメッセージを送ってきた。人類そのものよりも歴史の長いアーティファクトである超次元の門を抜け、未知の世界へ乗り出す旅だ。祝福されしアマルナトは彼女と一緒だった」
languages.original_text: "I know that my brother perished. But before he did, he sent me a message that told of a journey embarked upon by Theodora von Valancius. A journey through a dimensional gate — an artefact more ancient than Humanity itself — and toward worlds unknown. The blessed Amarnat was with her."

traits.locale_text: 「私の兄弟が死んだことは知っている。しかし彼は死ぬ前、私にシオドーラ・フォン・ヴァランシウスとの旅について知らせるメッセージを送ってきた。人類そのものよりも歴史の長いアーティファクトである超次元の門を抜け、未知の世界へ乗り出す旅だ。祝福されしアマルナトは彼女と一緒だった」

languages.text: “我知道我的兄弟死了，但在此之前，他曾给我传过信，内容是关于西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的某次旅行。她穿越了次元门，通向了另一个世界，那件造物甚至比人类本身还要古老。而当时，蒙福者阿玛纳特正和她在一起。”
languages.original_text: "I know that my brother perished. But before he did, he sent me a message that told of a journey embarked upon by Theodora von Valancius. A journey through a dimensional gate — an artefact more ancient than Humanity itself — and toward worlds unknown. The blessed Amarnat was with her."

traits.locale_text: “我知道我的兄弟死了，但在此之前，他曾给我传过信，内容是关于西奥多拉·冯·瓦兰修斯的某次旅行。她穿越了次元门，通向了另一个世界，那件造物甚至比人类本身还要古老。而当时，蒙福者阿玛纳特正和她在一起。”

languages.text: "Ich weiß, dass mein Bruder gestorben ist. Doch zuvor hat er mir eine Nachricht geschickt, die von einer Reise der Freihändlerin Theodora von Valancius berichtete. Eine Reise durch ein Dimensionstor — ein Artefakt älter als die Menschheit selbst — und zu unbekannten Welten. Der gesegnete Amarnat war bei ihr."
languages.original_text: "I know that my brother perished. But before he did, he sent me a message that told of a journey embarked upon by Theodora von Valancius. A journey through a dimensional gate — an artefact more ancient than Humanity itself — and toward worlds unknown. The blessed Amarnat was with her."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß, dass mein Bruder gestorben ist. Doch zuvor hat er mir eine Nachricht geschickt, die von einer Reise der Freihändlerin Theodora von Valancius berichtete. Eine Reise durch ein Dimensionstor — ein Artefakt älter als die Menschheit selbst — und zu unbekannten Welten. Der gesegnete Amarnat war bei ihr."

languages.text: « Je sais que mon frère a péri, mais avant sa mort, il m'a envoyé un message qui parlait d'un périple entrepris par Théodora von Valancius : une expédition à travers une porte dimensionnelle, un artefact plus ancien que l'humanité elle-même, en direction de mondes inconnus. Le bienheureux Amarnat se trouvait à ses côtés. »
languages.original_text: "I know that my brother perished. But before he did, he sent me a message that told of a journey embarked upon by Theodora von Valancius. A journey through a dimensional gate — an artefact more ancient than Humanity itself — and toward worlds unknown. The blessed Amarnat was with her."

traits.locale_text: « Je sais que mon frère a péri, mais avant sa mort, il m'a envoyé un message qui parlait d'un périple entrepris par Théodora von Valancius : une expédition à travers une porte dimensionnelle, un artefact plus ancien que l'humanité elle-même, en direction de mondes inconnus. Le bienheureux Amarnat se trouvait à ses côtés. »

languages.text: «Sé que mi hermano pereció. Pero antes me envió un mensaje en el que hablaba del viaje que había emprendido Theodora von Valancius. Un viaje a través de un portal dimensional, un artefacto más antiguo que la propia Humanidad, rumbo a mundos desconocidos. El bendito Amarnat la acompañaba».
languages.original_text: "I know that my brother perished. But before he did, he sent me a message that told of a journey embarked upon by Theodora von Valancius. A journey through a dimensional gate — an artefact more ancient than Humanity itself — and toward worlds unknown. The blessed Amarnat was with her."

traits.locale_text: «Sé que mi hermano pereció. Pero antes me envió un mensaje en el que hablaba del viaje que había emprendido Theodora von Valancius. Un viaje a través de un portal dimensional, un artefacto más antiguo que la propia Humanidad, rumbo a mundos desconocidos. El bendito Amarnat la acompañaba».

languages.text: "Kardeşimin telef olduğunu biliyorum. Ancak kaderiyle yüzleşmeden önce bana bir mesaj gönderdi, Theodora von Valancius'un atıldığı bir yolculuktan bahsediyordu... İnsanlığın kendisinden çok daha eski bir eserden, boyutsal bir geçitten, bilinmeyen bir dünyaya yapılan bir yolculuktan. Kutsanmış Amarnat da onun yanındaydı."
languages.original_text: "I know that my brother perished. But before he did, he sent me a message that told of a journey embarked upon by Theodora von Valancius. A journey through a dimensional gate — an artefact more ancient than Humanity itself — and toward worlds unknown. The blessed Amarnat was with her."

traits.locale_text: "Kardeşimin telef olduğunu biliyorum. Ancak kaderiyle yüzleşmeden önce bana bir mesaj gönderdi, Theodora von Valancius'un atıldığı bir yolculuktan bahsediyordu... İnsanlığın kendisinden çok daha eski bir eserden, boyutsal bir geçitten, bilinmeyen bir dünyaya yapılan bir yolculuktan. Kutsanmış Amarnat da onun yanındaydı."
